name: Smaller System
description:
3D space shooter based in a small solar system featuring destructible planets.

Fly a phyiscs based space ship around a mini solar system, trying to shoot missles at targets on minature planets with destructible terrain.

Try to destroy all the target's while dodging lasers fired from tanks on the planets surface.

Pro Tip: Fly around the planets to make sure you get all the targets! There are 4 planets total.

Controls

Pilot the ship using a controller or keyboard & mouse, using similar controls to No Man's Sky or other space flight games.
